name: QuestionnaireCCARSDrugUseRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Drug Use Rating
description: Extent to which a person's use of legal or illegal drugs impairs daily functioning.

concept.display: No impairment of general functioning due to drug use
Occasional difficulties in functioning due to drug use
Frequent difficulties in functioning due to drug use
Significantly impaired functioning due to drug use. Drug use dominates life to the exclusion of other activities
Constantly debilitated due to drug use, with no regard for basic needs or safety of self and others
